Name: Build upload-estimate tool

Name: plugin.docker.imageId, Value: golang:1.13-buster
Name: script.content, Value: #!/bin/bash

if [ -d "upload-estimate" ]; then
   echo Building upload-estimate...
   cd upload-estimate
   GOOS=linux go build
else
   echo upload-estimate not present
fi
